data.decision: Code pipeline validation successful - skills work but need refinement before production use
data.rationale: Ran full pipeline on olootu (126 Python files). code_review_verifier found real issues (106 warnings) but had 2 false positives. test_generate created 110 useful test stubs but required manual fixes for imports and async handling. Pipeline is viable for dev tooling focus but skills need hardening.
data.context: Phase 4.4 pivoted to code/dev tooling focus after abandoning Fashanus. This was first real-world validation of the code pipeline skills.
